personal.name: Dani Matar
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Building scalable distributed systems with 5+ years of experience

about.bio: I'm a passionate software engineer with over 5 years of experience specializing in building robust, scalable systems. My expertise spans across backend development with .NET and Python, automation pipelines, and distributed architectures that handle millions of requests.
highlights: 5+ years of professional software engineering experience
Expert in .NET ecosystem and Python development
Specialized in distributed systems and microservices
Strong focus on automation and DevOps practices
Passionate about clean code and system design

experience.description: Leading development of distributed backend systems processing millions of daily transactions.
highlights: Architected microservices infrastructure handling 10M+ daily requests
Reduced system latency by 40% through caching strategies
Implemented Redis logs pipeline decreasing retrieval time by 60%

experience.description: Software development with focus on backend services and automation.
highlights: Built RESTful APIs serving 50+ client applications
Developed automated deployment framework improving coverage to 85%
Architected and designed generic notification system, improving notifications delivery by 150%
Migrated legacy monolith to microservices architecture
Optimized database queries reducing load times by 50%

experience.description: Full-stack development in an agile startup environment.
highlights: Developed customer-facing features using Java Spring Boot and Flutter
Collaborated with cross-functional teams on product features

projects.title: Doctaura - Digital Health Platform
projects.description: A scalable distributed digital health platform built with .NET Core, React and PostgreSQL, capable of handling millions of concurrent patients appointment requests, online consultations, and more unique features.

projects.title: Vehicle to Pedestrian Communication System
projects.description: A scalable distributed peer-to-peer communication system, preventing pedestrian collision through real-time communication between clients symbolizing vehicle drivers and pedestrians.

projects.title: Distributed Task Scheduler
projects.description: A scalable distributed task scheduling system built with .NET Core and Redis, capable of handling millions of scheduled jobs with fault tolerance and horizontal scaling.

projects.title: API Gateway Service
projects.description: High-performance API gateway with rate limiting, authentication, and request routing for microservices architecture.

projects.title: Automation Pipeline Framework
projects.description: Extensible automation framework for CI/CD pipelines with support for multiple cloud providers and custom workflow definitions.

projects.title: Houses/Apartments Rental Automation Pipeline
projects.description: Advanced automation workflow for houses & apartments rental, allowing seamless management of reservations, welcoming guests and cleaning services.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time data visualization dashboard processing streaming data from multiple sources with live updates.

contact.heading: Let's Work Together
contact.message: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities, challenging projects, or just connecting with fellow developers. Feel free to reach out!
